name: Ice Pops & Popsicles - Make & Decorate Yummy Frozen Treats
name_original: Ice Pops & Popsicles - Make & Decorate Yummy Frozen Treats
description:
Ice Pops & Popsicles... Cool, creamy, fruity and crunchy. Create your own realistic frozen treats from scratch anytime!

Pick from tons of flavors, sweet candy toppings, and funny face stickers.

When you're done, you can save your treats to your photo library, post on Instagram, email, eat and share with your friends.
